name: Eater of Dust
description: The Eater of Dust is a Medium aberration with a formidable presence, featuring a Maw-Arm capable of the lethal combination of piercing and necrotic damage.
memorable: Its unique ability to diminish opponents' maximum hit points makes it a fearsome opponent, as it can potentially lead to quick defeats for unprepared adventurers.
goals: To drain the vitality of its opponents and dominate its territory, using its regeneration to outlast foes.
relations: It may be found in the company of other aberrations or dark creatures that thrive in desolate landscapes.
environment: Typically encountered in arid or desolate regions, where its abilities can thrive.
strengths: Possesses strong melee attacks, a high armor class, and significant regenerative capabilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which temporarily negates its regenerative abilities.
attacks: Can deliver powerful Maw-Arm strikes that deal piercing and additional necrotic damage, along with necrotic blasts.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to reduce an opponent's hit point maximum with its Maw-Arm attack while healing itself.
senses: Has blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings despite being blind beyond that range.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, Intimidation, and Perception, indicating strong physical prowess and a chilling presence.
additional_information: Regeneration of health each turn unless affected by fire damage.
Can teleport to unoccupied spaces near creatures.
Immune to lightning and poison damage.
Resistant to acid and cold damage.
Cannot die until starting its turn with 0 hit points and failing to regenerate.
